pullRequest.title: Disambiguate and document getEntities methods
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #1500

EntityView#getEntities(Class, ...) -> getEntitiesByClass
getEntities(EntityType, ...) -> getEntitiesByType
getEntities(Entity, ...) -> getOtherEntities
WorldChunk#getEntities(EntityType, ...) -> collectEntities
WorldChunk#getEntities(Class, ...) -> collectEntitiesByClass

nodes.bodyText: Hmm, so Mob or Hoglin interface etc cannot be used? Good note
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -58,11 +58,20 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2818 net/minecraft/world/chunk/WorldChunk
 		ARG 1 levelTypeProvider
 	METHOD method_12208 createBlockEntity (Lnet/minecraft/class_2338;)Lnet/minecraft/class_2586;
 		ARG 1 pos
-	METHOD method_12210 getEntities (Ljava/lang/Class;Lnet/minecraft/class_238;Ljava/util/List;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)V
+	METHOD method_12210 collectEntitiesByClass (Ljava/lang/Class;Lnet/minecraft/class_238;Ljava/util/List;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)V
+		COMMENT Collects a list of entities of some runtime type and appends them to the given list. The type of
+		COMMENT the collected entities will be a subclass of the given class.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT @throws IllegalArgumentException If {@code entityClass} is an interface or is not a subclass

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT @return A list of entities of the given type.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT @return a list of entities of the given type.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -80,7 +80,18 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_3218 net/minecraft/server/world/ServerWorld
 		ARG 1 x
 		ARG 2 z
 		ARG 3 forced
-	METHOD method_18198 getEntities (Lnet/minecraft/class_1299;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)Ljava/util/List;
+	METHOD method_18198 getEntitiesByType (Lnet/minecraft/class_1299;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)Ljava/util/List;
+		COMMENT Computes a list of entities of the given type.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT <strong>Warning:<strong> If {@code null} is passed as the entity type filter, care should be
+		COMMENT taken that the type argument {@code T} is set to {@link Entity}, otherwise heap pollution
+		COMMENT or bad casts can occur.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT @return A list of entities of the given type.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			COMMENT The entity type of the returned entities. If null, entities of all types are returned.
          
          
            
            			COMMENT the entity type of the returned entities. If null, entities of all types are returned.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -80,7 +80,18 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_3218 net/minecraft/server/world/ServerWorld
 		ARG 1 x
 		ARG 2 z
 		ARG 3 forced
-	METHOD method_18198 getEntities (Lnet/minecraft/class_1299;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)Ljava/util/List;
+	METHOD method_18198 getEntitiesByType (Lnet/minecraft/class_1299;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)Ljava/util/List;
+		COMMENT Computes a list of entities of the given type.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT <strong>Warning:<strong> If {@code null} is passed as the entity type filter, care should be
+		COMMENT taken that the type argument {@code T} is set to {@link Entity}, otherwise heap pollution
+		COMMENT or bad casts can occur.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT @return A list of entities of the given type.
+		ARG 1 type
+			COMMENT The entity type of the returned entities. If null, entities of all types are returned.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			COMMENT A predicate which entities must satisfy in order to be considered.
          
          
            
            			COMMENT a predicate which entities must satisfy in order to be considered.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -80,7 +80,18 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_3218 net/minecraft/server/world/ServerWorld
 		ARG 1 x
 		ARG 2 z
 		ARG 3 forced
-	METHOD method_18198 getEntities (Lnet/minecraft/class_1299;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)Ljava/util/List;
+	METHOD method_18198 getEntitiesByType (Lnet/minecraft/class_1299;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)Ljava/util/List;
+		COMMENT Computes a list of entities of the given type.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT <strong>Warning:<strong> If {@code null} is passed as the entity type filter, care should be
+		COMMENT taken that the type argument {@code T} is set to {@link Entity}, otherwise heap pollution
+		COMMENT or bad casts can occur.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT @return A list of entities of the given type.
+		ARG 1 type
+			COMMENT The entity type of the returned entities. If null, entities of all types are returned.
+		ARG 2 predicate
+			COMMENT A predicate which entities must satisfy in order to be considered.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT @return A list of entities within a box, excluding the given entity, all satisfying the given predicate.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT @return a list of entities within a box, excluding the given entity, all satisfying the given predicate.

@@ -76,19 +76,39 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1924 net/minecraft/world/EntityView
 		ARG 1 entityClass
 		ARG 2 box
 		ARG 3 predicate
-	METHOD method_8333 getEntities (Lnet/minecraft/class_1297;Lnet/minecraft/class_238;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)Ljava/util/List;
+	METHOD method_8333 getSurroundingEntities (Lnet/minecraft/class_1297;Lnet/minecraft/class_238;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;)Ljava/util/List;
+		COMMENT Computes a list of entities surrounding the given entity within some box.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT @return A list of entities within a box, excluding the given entity, all satisfying the given predicate.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			COMMENT The entity the box logically surrounds. This entity is ignored if it is inside the box.
          
          
            
            			COMMENT the entity the box logically surrounds. This entity is ignored if it is inside the box.

@@ -76,19 +76,39 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1924 net/minecraft/world/EntityView
 		ARG 1 entityClass
 		ARG 2 box
 		ARG 3 predicate

+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT @return A list of entities within a box, excluding the given entity, all satisfying the given predicate.
 		ARG 1 except
+			COMMENT The entity the box logically surrounds. This entity is ignored if it is inside the box.

commit.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: liach <7806504+liach@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Yanis48 <doublecraft.official@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: "surrounding" is really a bad name for this

Type arguments are erased at runtime, how would this make a difference? The heap pollution thing at first glance sounds like a load of rubbish, can you clarify precisely under what conditions this can occur?

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -76,19 +76,39 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1924 net/minecraft/world/EntityView
 		ARG 1 entityClass
 		ARG 2 box
 		ARG 3 predicate

+		COMMENT Computes a list of entities surrounding the given entity within some box.
+		COMMENT
+		COMMENT @return a list of entities within a box, excluding the given entity, all satisfying the given predicate
 		ARG 1 except
+			COMMENT the entity the box logically surrounds. This entity is ignored if it is inside the box.
 		ARG 2 box
+			COMMENT the box in which to search for entities
 		ARG 3 predicate
-	METHOD method_8335 getEntities (Lnet/minecraft/class_1297;Lnet/minecraft/class_238;)Ljava/util/List;
+			COMMENT a predicate which entities must satisfy in order to be included in the returned list.
+	METHOD method_8335 getSurroundingEntities (Lnet/minecraft/class_1297;Lnet/minecraft/class_238;)Ljava/util/List;

nodes.bodyText: I'd say getEntitiesWithin or some amalgamation of that since the box specifies the volume to search within.

commit.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Changes to some parameter docs to reflect method naming.

Co-authored-by: i509VCB <i509vcb@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: of the given type (if a non-null type is given) and matching the predicate!
